title: AniceInovation
author: AniceInovation
content: Here's the link: https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=00020220711185109085o99L6nF90644I'm quite interested in this, but i only want 2 units, and minimum order is 188!Wondering if a group buy would be possible with EU members.Preferably created by a known member for more truthiness.Just leaving this here to check interest!

comments.author: GFDhd
comments.body: Quote from: AniceInovation on July 17, 2022, 05:31:18 PMHere's the link: https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=00020220711185109085o99L6nF90644I'm quite interested in this, but i only want 2 units, and minimum order is 188!I think you may have misunderstood, the introduction I saw is "NOTES 1.Each user is limited to 188 units." Then it should mean that a customer can order a maximum of 188 units, not a minimum.

comments.author: AniceInovation
comments.body: Quote from: GFDhd on July 30, 2022, 07:46:56 AMQuote from: AniceInovation on July 17, 2022, 05:31:18 PMHere's the link: https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=00020220711185109085o99L6nF90644I'm quite interested in this, but i only want 2 units, and minimum order is 188!I think you may have misunderstood, the introduction I saw is "NOTES 1.Each user is limited to 188 units." Then it should mean that a customer can order a maximum of 188 units, not a minimum.Nope.I contacted Bitmain, here's their reply:QuoteDear Customer. Thank you very much for your interest in our products.Please refer to the following link for information about Bitcoin Miner T19 Hydro.https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=00020220711185109085o99L6nF90644  Please refer to the following link for information about ANTSPACE HK3.https://shop.bitmain.com/product/detail?pid=0002021123118285350583K2a0P505EF The current Pre-order MOQ of Bitcoin Miner T19 Hydro is 188 units and we recommend purchasing it together with ANTSPACE HK3.Please fill out the bulk order form if you have a related need.https://www.bitmain.com/bulkOrder Please fill in the cell phone number for registering WhatsApp or Telegram.We will notify the sales manager to contact you as soon as possible to discuss the matter, the general waiting time is about one week.Thank you for your cooperation. Best regards,NickBITMAINAnyway the interest is so low (no other participants here) that this should be canceled i guess.

comments.author: omid_3_3
comments.body: could anyone tell me what is the chip used in this device ?in product specification not mention any type of this information like how many hashboard it has or how many chip is used in this . not even the frequency . but i found a picture in product manual , but I'm not sure it's correct or not . https://postimg.cc/LgLSvhRKin this image i see 4 hashboard , each has 104 chips that works in 550 MHz frequency . please let me know if this info is correct or not . and if you know what is the difference with S19 Hydro 3950$ with same amount of the hashboard and chip with little more frequency 600MHz . https://postimg.cc/RNCdmy6Kis S19 Hydro use another type of the chip ? please let me know what you think ? i am interest to but more than 100 pcs and if anyone want's 1 or 2pcs , i'll be happy to sell you when i get my shipment .

comments.author: AniceInovation
comments.body: Googling a bit i found this: https://www.zeusbtc.com/MinerDetails.asp?ID=278Normally the T version of antminer miners have fewer chips at higher voltages/frequencies, they get higher hashrates from lower efficiency and prices.If you could purchase the entire 188 batch and then sell a few of them with escrow, i at least would be interested!

comments.author: omid_3_3
comments.created_time: August 15, 2022, 11:13:59 AMLast edit: August 16, 2022, 09:17:43 AM by omid_3_3
comments.body: hi Did you see the pictures in those links i sent , if this is true that T19 and S19 have same type of the chip , same number of the chip used in one device and ,etc how could this Possible that more frequency , more hashrate , less power ? https://www.zeusbtc.com/Upload/image/202208/16595181831684827.jpgsome thing is not correct in my opinion .

comments.author: AniceInovation
comments.body: Quote from: omid_3_3 on August 15, 2022, 11:13:59 AMif this is true that T19 and S19 have same chip , same number of chip used in one device and ,etc As i said, T versions have fewer chips at higher frequencies/voltages.

comments.author: omid_3_3
comments.body: i asked the same thing from Bitmain support and they reply this  Nick (BITMAIN) Aug 16, 2022, 15:47 GMT+8 Dear Customer,1.   Each S19 Hydro or T19 Hydro has 4 hashboards.2.   The chip model of S19 Hydro or T19 Hydro is BM1398BB, there are 104 chips on each hashboard, and a mining machine has a total of 416 chips.3.   There is no special difference between different water-cooled miners except for the model, hashrate, etc.________________________________________To buy ANTMINERs, please log in to the website: https://www.bitmain.com/ Kindly be ware of phishing scams and always verify the domain name."Solved" means we replied - we may still be working on your issue.
